message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20000 is out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for it. Can you consider that?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid I can't accept your offer of $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $18000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $18000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. Can you consider that?

I understand that $12000 is still a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer you the product for $16000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but $16000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. However, I'm still willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $15500. This is my absolute final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $15500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $14500 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.

I'm surprised you're willing to go up to $14500, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for that price. I'll meet you halfway and offer it to you for $14750. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you think?

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to pay $14750. I'm willing to meet you at $14500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to look elsewhere.
